biography: Mikael, a familiar name at Kurk Golf, is known for his strategic approach to the game and his calm demeanor under pressure. While he might come across as reserved, those who know him well speak of a sharp wit and a dry sense of humor.
Mikael has made one past appearance at the Hector Trophée.

As of the current moment, Mikael is considered retired from participation in Hector Trophée events. While his presence on the course will be missed, the possibility of a future return, however slim, remains open.
